snippet: A musical by Sam Davis and Sean Hartley is mixed in with one-acts by Paul Rudnick, Neil LaBute and James McLure in a six-script festival at 59E59 Theaters.
abstract: Daniel M Gold reviews Series B of the Summer Shorts theater festival at 59E59 Theaters, which includes short works by Sam Davis, Sean Hartley, Paul Rudnick, Neil LaBute and James McLure.
lead_paragraph: A musical by Sam Davis and Sean Hartley is mixed in with one-acts by Paul Rudnick, Neil LaBute and James McLure in a six-script festival at 59E59 Theaters.

headline.main: Mixing It Up With the Charmer, the Flight Attendant and the Pundette
headline.print_headline: Mixing It Up With the Charmer, the Flight Attendant and the Pundette
